events.title: RTV CRON 0x3
events.description: The third episode of RTV CRON is coming May 29th! We'll be providing updates on our DEF CON 33 plans and Mike Bell will be presenting 'Introduction to Ghidra and Version Tracking'.

events.title: RTV @ HackSpaceCon
events.description: RTV will be at HackSpaceCon 2025. We'll have a booth and we'll be discussing the latest news in the village. We'll also be hosting a CTF competition.

events.title: Red Team Village @ DEF CON 33
events.location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Red Team Village Area
events.description: Visit the village at DEF CON 33! We'll have a weekend packed with workshops, activities, swag, and so much more!
